name: Invoker
description: Invoke Token ($INV) is the core of the Invokers Ecosystem including the Upcoming InvokersMMO. Holders of InvokersNFT (& Upcoming Collections) are able to claim 10-20 $INV/Day, which can be accumulated to breed Invokers Elves & Invokers Spellbooks to claim higher amounts of $INV/Day. Invoke will also be the core currency of Invokers MMORPG, the first Solana based Open world, Quest based MMORPG
